subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Vijay Singh roared into a tie for the lead with Dudley Hart in the AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am on Saturday, while Phil Mickelson missed the cut here for the first time in six years.
snippet: Vijay Singh roared into a tie for the lead with Dudley Hart in the AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am on Saturday, while Phil Mickelson missed the cut here for the first time in six years.
